Handles more potential problems with input, such as XSS attacks.

static& filterInput (  )  [static]

Cleans input. Caches locally.

Takes all available $_GET, $_POST, and $_COOKIE input and reduces the chances of attacks and problems.

Also cleans the source IP address.

Returns:
array The cleaned input
